text: National Council of Applied Economic Research (NCAER) is a New Delhi based non-profit think tank of economics.Official WebsiteNational Council of Applied Economic Research Nandan Nilekani is president of the governing body and Dr Shekhar Shah is current director general of NCAER. == History == It was established in 1956 with financial support from the Ford Foundation, Finance Ministry and Tata Sons. Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru laid the foundation stone of NCAER campus on 31 October 1959. From 2001 to 2011, Suman Bery served as the director general.https://www.mastercardcenter.org/our-fellows/suman-berry ==See also== *National Institute of Public Finance and Policy == References == Category:Think tanks based in India Category:Organisations based in Delhi Category:Research institutes in Delhi
